title: Immediate hypnotic induction with Fascination & Non-verbal hypnosis / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, demonstrate Immediate hypnotic induction with Fascination & Non-verbal hypnosis. Dr. Paret used Fascination - the power of the gaze and Mesmerism. These two techniques from the ancient traditions, he is teaching exclusively at his school, which is the most advanced in this field. The subject enters in a deep hypnotic induction, that liberates her from deep within. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
